databaseConfig.sql:
select DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE_ID , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.UPDATE_DATE , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.FILE_NAME , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DATA , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID ,
DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DELETE_FLAG , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.SEND_FLAG , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.VESSEL_ID , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DATA_NO , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.USER_KEY , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.RENEW_DATE , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.RENEW_USER_ID , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.TS
from DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE INNER JOIN DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU ON DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU.DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID = DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID AND (DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)
WHERE (DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.DELETE_FLAG is NULL) AND DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE.SEND_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE ( DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE_ID , UPDATE_DATE , FILE_NAME , DATA , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE_ID , :UPDATE_DATE , :FILE_NAME , :DATA , :DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE SET UPDATE_DATE = :UPDATE_DATE , FILE_NAME = :FILE_NAME , DATA = :DATA , DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID = :DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_ID , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE_ID = :DM_KOUBUNSHO_KISOKU_FILE_ID
